metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4010 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the USB Host Controller Driver framework in the Linuxkernel. The usb_giveback_urb function has a logic loophole in itsimplementation. Due to the inappropriate judgment condition of the gotostatement, the function cannot return under the input of a specificmalformed descriptor file, so it falls into an endless loop, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
